channel.title: [URGENT] Vote4Cash [WEBSITE HELP]
channel.description:
Right, so I am using Kurdz source (Project-Eckov4) 474 He left a message in the source in a .txt file saying...
AutoVote, Hiscores are coded in, the links just need to be changed and the website part has to be coded by YOU, im not coding in for anyone, i might make a tutorial of how to code it website side for this source only, :P.
I have asked kurdz for some help and he has not responded to my reply, Hopefully someone from the moparscape community could help me code in a Vote4Cash system, [b]I am willing to reward someone with PayPal $ if they successfully help me[/b], I won't go first unless you are trusted, If you can help me then please add me on MSN! @ GoodFightConnection@live.co.uk

item.title: [URGENT] Vote4Cash [WEBSITE HELP]
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“GoodFightConnection, post:5, topic:414448”][quote author=eballer48 link=topic=516411.msg3748250#msg3748250 date=1315851293]

First of all… your not allowed to pay for services here…
Second. Learn PHP and Mysql this is not a spoon feeding community.
Third. Why is this ‘URGENT’?

This section is clearly named “Server Help” I need help with my server, so I posted here… I am not looking for spoonfeeding information, I have not asked for spoonfeeding information I just simply asked for some help and to add my msn for more details, so gtfo troll.

YOU want me to TROLL!? K this is website sided clearly its coded for the server because you said so your self. Therefore all that needs to be done is writing a php script for a website. You said you know PHP have fun writing it, this is ‘Server Help’ not ‘Website Help’ GL have fun.
[/quote]

omfg, kid listen, I SAID I NEED HELP SOURCE SIDED, i already know PHP, HTML, JS, CSS, JSQUERY, either help me or jog on, stop trolling, this section is for “SERVER HELP” I never said I needed assistance with my website, I know it is already coded in the source, but i don’t know where it is located and I don’t know how to link to my site… wow… now gtfo and go troll somewhere else…[/quote]
Kid? I bet your balls haven’t even dropped yet. And before this you were a first time poster so how about you gtfo and go to rune - server with the rest of the leechs. And you know js right? So you should know what files the codes located in. Gtfo. -rep
